name: opencode-sandbox
description: OpenCode plugin that sandboxes agent commands using @anthropic-ai/sandbox-runtime (seatbelt on macOS, bubblewrap on Linux)

scripts.build: bun build ./src/index.ts --outdir dist --target node --format esm --external @anthropic-ai/sandbox-runtime --external @opencode-ai/plugin && bun x tsc --emitDeclarationOnly --declaration --outDir dist
